com.jrefinery.chart
Class BarPlot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Plot
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.BarPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisChangeListener, CategoryPlot, ChartChangeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
HorizontalBarPlot, VerticalBarPlot
public abstract class BarPlot
extends Plot
implements CategoryPlot

A general plotting class that uses data from a CategoryDataset, and presents that data in the form of bars.

See Also:
Plot, CategoryDataSource

Field Summary
protected  double categoryGapsPercent
          The percentage of the overall drawing space allocated to providing gaps between the last bar in one category and the first bar in the next category.
protected static double DEFAULT_CATEGORY_GAPS_PERCENT
          Default value for the total gap to be distributed between categories.

          Default value for the gap before the first bar in the plot.

          Default value for the total gap to be distributed between items within a category.

          Default value for the gap after the last bar in the plot.

BarPlot

public BarPlot(Axis horizontal,
               Axis vertical,
               java.awt.Insets insets,
               double introGapPercent,
               double trailGapPercent,
               double categoryGapsPercent,
               double itemGapsPercent)
        throws AxisNotCompatibleException,
               PlotNotCompatibleException
Standard constructor: returns a BarPlot with attributes specified by the caller.
Parameters:
horizontal - The horizontal axis;
vertical - The vertical axis;
introGapPercent - The gap before the first bar in the plot, as a percentage of the available drawing space;
trailGapPercent - The gap after the last bar in the plot, as a percentage of the available drawing space;
categoryGapsPercent - The percentage of drawing space allocated to the gap between the last bar in one category and the first bar in the next category;
itemGapsPercent - The gap between bars within the same category;

getIntroGapPercent

public double getIntroGapPercent()
Returns the gap before the first bar on the chart, as a percentage of the available drawing space (0.05 = 5 percent).

setIntroGapPercent

public void setIntroGapPercent(double percent)
Sets the gap before the first bar on the chart, and notifies registered listeners that the plot has been modified.
Parameters:
percent - The new gap value.

getTrailGapPercent

public double getTrailGapPercent()
Returns the gap following the last bar on the chart, as a percentage of the available drawing space.

setTrailGapPercent

public void setTrailGapPercent(double percent)
Sets the gap after the last bar on the chart, and notifies registered listeners that the plot has been modified.
Parameters:
percent - The new gap value.

getCategoryGapsPercent

public double getCategoryGapsPercent()
Returns the percentage of the drawing space that is allocated to providing gaps between the categories.

setCategoryGapsPercent

public void setCategoryGapsPercent(double percent)
Sets the gap between the last bar in one category and the first bar in the next category, and notifies registered listeners that the plot has been modified.
Parameters:
gap - The new gap value.

getItemGapsPercent

public double getItemGapsPercent()
Returns the gap between one bar and the next within the same category, measured in Java 2D User Space units.

setItemGapsPercent

public void setItemGapsPercent(double percent)
Sets the gap between one bar and the next within the same category, and notifies registered listeners that the plot has been modified.
Parameters:
percent - The new gap value.
